(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP We))
    (VP (VBD ran)
      (NP (DT a) (NN competition))
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NNP Gourmet) (NNP Culinary) (NNP Cooking) (NNP Class) (JJ last) (NN month))
          (CC and)
          (NP (PRP$ our) (NN winner)))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(ran-2, We-1)
root(ROOT-0, ran-2)
det(competition-4, a-3)
dobj(ran-2, competition-4)
prep(ran-2, for-5)
det(month-12, the-6)
nn(month-12, Gourmet-7)
nn(month-12, Culinary-8)
nn(month-12, Cooking-9)
nn(month-12, Class-10)
amod(month-12, last-11)
pobj(for-5, month-12)
cc(month-12, and-13)
poss(winner-15, our-14)
conj(month-12, winner-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Angeline) (NNP Sim))
    (ADVP (RB now))
    (VP (VBZ reports)
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP (PRP$ her) (NN experience)))
      (ADVP (RB there)))
    (. .)))

advmod(reports-4, now-3)
root(ROOT-0, reports-4)
prep(reports-4, on-5)
poss(experience-7, her-6)
pobj(on-5, experience-7)
advmod(reports-4, there-8)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NN resident) (NN Chef) (NNP Robert) (NNP Kyle) (NNP Newton))
    (VP (VBZ aims)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB debunk)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NNS myths))
              (VP (VBG surrounding)
                (NP (NN gourmet) (NN cooking))
                (PP (IN by)
                  (S
                    (VP (VBG deconstructing)
                      (NP (DT the) (NNS basics))
                      (PP (IN for)
                        (S
                          (VP (VBG whipping)
                            (PRT (RP up))
                            (NP (DT a)
                              (ADJP
                                (ADJP (JJ delicious))
                                (CC yet)
                                (ADJP (JJ simple)
                                  (CC and)
                                  (JJ cost-efficient)))
                              (NN gourmet) (NN meal))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nn(Newton-5, resident-1)
nn(Newton-5, Chef-2)
nn(Newton-5, Robert-3)
nn(Newton-5, Kyle-4)
nsubj(aims-6, Newton-5)
root(ROOT-0, aims-6)
aux(debunk-8, to-7)
xcomp(aims-6, debunk-8)
det(myths-10, the-9)
dobj(debunk-8, myths-10)
partmod(myths-10, surrounding-11)
nn(cooking-13, gourmet-12)
dobj(surrounding-11, cooking-13)
prep(surrounding-11, by-14)
pcomp(by-14, deconstructing-15)
det(basics-17, the-16)
dobj(deconstructing-15, basics-17)
prep(deconstructing-15, for-18)
pcomp(for-18, whipping-19)
prt(whipping-19, up-20)
det(meal-28, a-21)
amod(meal-28, delicious-22)
cc(delicious-22, yet-23)
conj(delicious-22, simple-24)
cc(simple-24, and-25)
conj(simple-24, cost-efficient-26)
nn(meal-28, gourmet-27)
dobj(whipping-19, meal-28)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Chef) (NNP Robert))
    (VP (VBZ takes)
      (NP (NN pride))
      (PP (IN in)
        (S
          (VP (VBG drilling)
            (NP (NN home))
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN message))
              (SBAR (IN that)
                (S
                  (NP (DT any) (JJ amateur) (NN chef-wannabe))
                  (VP (MD can)
                    (VP (VB achieve)
                      (NP
                        (NP (NN gourmet) (NN cooking) (NN right))
                        (PP (IN in)
                          (NP
                            (NP (DT the) (NNS comforts))
                            (PP (IN of)
                              (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ own) (NN home)))))))))))))))
    (. !)))

det(message-9, the-8)
dobj(drilling-6, message-9)

det(chef-wannabe-13, any-11)

  (S
    (ADVP (RB then))
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP
      (ADVP (RB probably))
      (VBP have)
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WP what))
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBZ takes)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB cook)
                  (PP (IN like)
                    (NP (DT a) (JJ bona-fide) (NN gourmet) (NN chef))))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (NP (PRP He))

      (NP (DT some) (NNS ways))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB prepare)
            (NP
              (NP (JJ basic) (NNS stocks)
                (CC and)
                (NNS sauces))
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WDT which))
                (S
                  (VP (VBP form)
                    (S
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT the) (NN basis))
                        (PP (IN of)
                          (NP (DT all) (NNS things))))
                      (ADJP (JJ tasty)))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP We))
    (VP (VBD had)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP
            (VP (VB conceptualize))
            (CC and)
            (VP (VB whip)
              (PRT (RP up))
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (NN dish))
                (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (NNS pairs)))
                  (-RRB- -RRB-)))
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NNS ingredients))
                  (VP (VBN provided)
                    (PP (IN within)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT a) (NN time) (NN limit))
                        (PP (IN of)
                          (NP (CD 2) (NNS hours)))))))))))))
    (. .)))

pobj(in-11, pairs-12)
prep(whip-6, with-14)

pobj(with-14, ingredients-16)

prep(provided-17, within-18)

pobj(within-18, limit-21)
prep(limit-21, of-22)
num(hours-24, 2-23)
pobj(of-22, hours-24)

  (S
    (S
      (VP (VB Take)

        (PP (IN at)
          (NP (DT these) (NNS pictures)))))

    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (MD 'll)
        (VP (VB see)

            (WHNP (WP what) (DT a) (NN success))

              (NP (DT this) (NN course))

    (. !)))
